Ensure S3 bucket has block public ACLS enabled
code_block:
resource "aws_s3_bucket_public_access_block" "sampleapril26426" {
  bucket                  = aws_s3_bucket.sampleapril26426.id
  block_public_acls       = true
  block_public_policy     = true
  ignore_public_acls      = true
  restrict_public_buckets = true
}

Ensure KMS key is enabled
Ensure KMS key policy does not contain wildcard (*) principal
Ensure rotation for customer created CMKs is enabled
Ensure CloudTrail log file validation is enabled
code_block:
resource "aws_cloudtrail" "eb_cloudtrail" {
  name                          = "eb_cloudtrail"
  s3_bucket_name                = aws_s3_bucket.sampleapril26426.id
  s3_key_prefix                 = "cloudtrail"
  include_global_service_events = true
  is_multi_region_trail         = true
  enable_log_file_validation    = true
}

passed_checks.check_name: Ensure that CloudWatch Log Group specifies retention days
Ensure that CloudWatch alarm actions are enabled
code_block:
resource "aws_cloudwatch_metric_alarm" "eb_cpu_alarm" {
  alarm_name          = "eb_cpu_alarm"
  comparison_operator = "GreaterThanOrEqualToThreshold"
  evaluation_periods  = "2"
  metric_name         = "CPUUtilization"
  namespace           = "AWS/ElasticBeanstalk"
  period              = "300"
  statistic           = "Average"
  threshold           = "80"
  alarm_description   = "This metric monitors ec2 cpu utilization"
  alarm_actions       = [aws_sns_topic.eb_alarm_topic.arn]
  dimensions = {
    EnvironmentName = aws_elastic_beanstalk_environment.myapp_env.name
  }
}
